sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "../Home/home.css"; import "../Product/product.css"; import axios from 'axios'; // import logout from "../Functions/logout"; function Product() { const {id} = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [data, setData] = useState({ item: { name: "", category: "", cost: 0, ownerID: "", age: "", imageURL: [ "" ], description: "", bids: [] }, user: { username: "", } }); const [username, setUsername] = useState(); function logout(){ localStorage.removeItem('token'); navigate('/login'); } useEffect(()=>{ console.log(id); const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); axios.get( `http://localhost:5000/product/${id}`, { headers : { Authorization: token, }}).then(async (res) =>{ console.log(res.data); setUsername(res.data.user.username) setData(res.data); console.log(data.item); // console.log(res.data.item.name); }) .catch((error) => { // console.log(error); navigate('/login'); }); },[]); return

MEGHA

{username}
{/*

{data.item.name}

{data.item.description}

Product Details

Category {data.item.category}
Purchased YEAR {data.item.buyYear}
Bill Available Yes
Box Available No
Accesssories Available No
Warranty Available Yes

Owner Details

Owner Name Anjali
Email anjali123@gmail.com

Bids

Arjun $ 40000
Placed On 05-03-2023 12:18 PM
Arjun $ 52000
Placed On 04-03-2023 08:02 PM
Arjun $ 35000
Placed On 08-03-2023 09:40 PM
*/}
} export default Product;
